summary: Adds sparring partner at the Companions training ground behind Jorrvaskr
descriptionHtml:
Features:
-Adds an NPC to Whiterun -Behind Jorrvaskr on the Companion's training ground- that attacks on Player's choice.
-You dont have any restriction/bounty for attacking him.
-When he is about to die he will surrender and stop hostilities.
-You can attack with whatever kind of magic or weapon you want ;)

(no voice acting... I suck at voice acting... Belive me I tried..)


Changelog:
Version 1.1 (07/08/2014)
-(Fix) Companions doesn't attack the trainer when the player is in the faction.
-(Fix) Fixed a stupid mess i made when uploading last time... sry guys getting used to nexus too...


Compatibility:
- Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul: If you are using this Great mod (and if You don't I recomend you to do so)
You might want to play with the options: Fearless and steady fast enemys and essential actors invincible ON
if you don't want your trainer runing like a little girl every time you defeat him... or dying.


MOD Suggestions:
This is the best mod ever!!:
Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul by Xarrian and Ogerboss.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?

and Azirok made a lot of compatibility patches:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38197/?

check them out they are the best!


Note:
I made this because didn't like training on dummys
(and hate having use conjuration to train armor skills).
I wanted to share it so anyone would use it or do whatever you like with it.


Note 2:
I'm still looking a way to make the trainer stop attacking on weapon sheathe with no luck... tried some events and make him friend after combat but he doesn't want to stop (he hates me a lot).
I would appreciate any ideas


Thanks for passing by!
Happy sparring! :P
author: mochman
